attributes.action: Support the call for Justice for The Two Nottingham Police Dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get justice for the two  Nottingham Police dogs that were left to die in the policedog handlers vehicle in the extreme heat of last tuesday 30th June 09. We would like to see that officer involved either suspended or sacked due to his negligence & the death of these 2 working dogs who've given their lives to serve us.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
